idea-plugin.name: OnLog - Multi-Channel Log Viewer
idea-plugin.description:
Structured log viewer for Go applications using onlog/zerolog. Zero-config: Just run your app from IDE and see logs instantly!

Features

  • Zero-config: Import onlog, run your app, see logs
  • Auto-detection of log output via Console Filter
  • Smart auto-scroll with manual override
  • Filter by source, category, level, and tags
  • Color-coded log levels (DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR)
  • Clickable caller info for source navigation
  • Search across all logs
  • Source tree with hierarchical categories
  • Multiple views: Use IntelliJ's native split/tab features

Usage

  1. Import the onlog Go library in your application
  2. Use onlog.L("source").Info().Msg("message")
  3. Run your application from IDE - logs appear in OnLog window
  4. Right-click OnLog tab for split/duplicate options
